string.value: The Baby Bird that hatched from the egg flew away freely with an indifferent and almost smug expression. The only thing left are some of its soft feathers. Hmm... Looks like #b#p9000042##k wants to say something.

#p9000042#, with tears flowing down his smiling face, says that he is thrilled the cute Baby Bird hatched. He wants to keep a #b#t4032066##k as a momento. The Baby Bird really wasn't all that cute...but maybe you should just give him a feather.
#p9000042#, after receiving the #t4032066#, jumped for joy saying that he would always treasure it. Now he's preparing to take care of the next egg...

Did you see? A cute little chick hatched out of its egg! I'm happy yet sad, thinking of this little chick saying goodbye with its two eyes so round and wide. I think I'm going to cry...\r\n#L0##b(He seems rather stoic and indifferent...)
The little birdie flew away, but I will always have the fond memories. To remember the little birdie, I'd like to keep a #t4032066#... Would you be so kind as to give me the #t4032066# you have?
Wow, thank you! I'll wait here until you give me the feather!
I suppose you, too, wish to hold on to your memories with the birdie. Oh well, I understand.
